sources.name: Parquet1
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> Parquet1

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared Parquet1 = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.DataLakeContents("https://testv2storage.dfs.core.windows.net/adf/Output/results"),
  Parquet = Parquet.Document(AdfDoc)
in
  Parquet;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = Parquet1,
  #"Removed duplicates" = Table.Distinct(Source, {"order-id"}),
  #"Grouped rows" = Table.Group(#"Removed duplicates", {"purchase-date"}, {{"dailySales", each List.Sum([#"item-price"]), type nullable number}})
in
  #"Grouped rows";
